name: Bakery Town
description:
Bake it big and make it big!
Do you have what it takes to save your bakery?

Bake gorgeous cakes, delicious cookies, mouth-watering muffins, scrumptious pies and plenty more! Make different types of coffee and tea or smoothies and yummy milkshakes!
The better your tasty treats, the happier your customers will be!

Watch your bustling baking business rise like your pies - expand your menu, invest in new appliances, display your edible masterpieces and decorate the place with hundreds of cool, fancy and fun items.

Buy wallpapers, windows and doors, tables and chairs, employ better chefs with special skills, add more space to your bakery and even more floors once the business really gets boomin!

Connect with your friends via Facebook or Game Center, share your accomplishments, send them gifts or write on their walls.
